title: toxic players
body: is it just me or is league now a lot less toxic? i just returned to league of legends last week after several monthes not playing and i went like 8 games in a row where everyone was respectful and there were no toxic people. before i came back when i played league i usually get toxic people every game.

replies.body: Not sure were you are but OCE still the most toxic place on the planet
Naaaa, level a new account. It's sickening how many games in a row before you hit lvl 30 that are filled with absolutely disgusting players.
I fear that I am becoming that toxic player, which Is why I quit. Just tired of this game right now, and I'm not the greatest fan of Dynamic Queue either.
URF took away a lot of the players toxicity. It'll start to build up soon though.
thats because they are on voice comms
